vernac_cmds: Hypothesis A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}.
Fixpoint remove_all (to_delete l : list A) : list A := match to_delete with | [] => l | d :: ds => remove_all ds (remove A_eq_dec d l) end.
Lemma in_remove_all_was_in : forall ds l x, In x (remove_all ds l) -> In x l.
induction ds; intros; simpl in *; intuition.
Lemma in_remove_all_preserve : forall ds l x, ~ In x ds -> In x l -> In x (remove_all ds l).
induction ds; intros; simpl in *; intuition auto using remove_preserve.
Lemma in_remove_all_not_in : forall ds l x, In x (remove_all ds l) -> In x ds -> False.
induction ds; intros; simpl in *; intuition.
Lemma remove_all_nil : forall ys, remove_all ys [] = [].
Lemma remove_all_cons : forall ys a l, (remove_all ys (a :: l) = remove_all ys l /\ In a ys) \/ (remove_all ys (a :: l) = a :: (remove_all ys l) /\ ~In a ys).
induction ys; intros; simpl in *; intuition.
Lemma before_remove_all : forall x y l ys, before x y (remove_all ys l) -> ~ In y ys -> before x y l.
induction l; intros; simpl in *; intuition.
pose proof remove_all_cons ys a l.
Lemma before_remove_all_if : forall x y l xs, before x y l -> ~ In x xs -> before x y (remove_all xs l).
induction l; intros; simpl in *; intuition; pose proof remove_all_cons xs a l; subst; intuition; repeat find_rewrite; simpl in *; intuition.
Lemma NoDup_remove_all : forall l l', NoDup l' -> NoDup (remove_all l l').
pose proof remove_all_cons l a l'.
Lemma remove_all_NoDup_split : forall l l' l0 l1 a, NoDup l' -> remove_all l l' = l0 ++ a :: l1 -> remove_all l (remove A_eq_dec a l') = l0 ++ l1.
destruct l0; simpl in *; match goal with H: [] = _ |- _ => contradict H end; auto using nil_cons.
pose proof remove_all_cons l a l'.
match goal with H0: NoDup _, H1: _ = remove_all _ _ |- _ => specialize (IHl' _ _ _ H0 (eq_sym H1)) end.
destruct l0; simpl in *; find_rewrite; find_injection; auto.
match goal with H: _ = remove_all _ _ |- _ => rewrite <- H end.
pose proof remove_all_cons l a l'.
pose proof remove_all_cons l a (remove A_eq_dec a0 l').
destruct l0; simpl in *; find_injection; intuition.
match goal with H0: NoDup _, H1: _ = remove_all _ _ |- _ => specialize (IHl' _ _ _ H0 (eq_sym H1)) end.
pose proof remove_all_cons l a (remove A_eq_dec a0 l').
Lemma remove_all_app_l : forall xs ys zs, remove_all (xs ++ ys) zs = remove_all xs (remove_all ys zs).
pose proof (remove_all_cons xs a (remove_all ys zs)).
repeat (break_or_hyp; break_and); repeat find_rewrite; try find_eapply_lem_hyp in_app_or; try assert (In a (xs ++ ys)) by (eapply in_or_app; eauto); tauto.
Lemma remove_all_app_r : forall xs ys zs, remove_all xs (ys ++ zs) = remove_all xs ys ++ remove_all xs zs.
Lemma remove_all_del_comm : forall xs ys zs, remove_all xs (remove_all ys zs) = remove_all ys (remove_all xs zs).
pose proof (remove_all_cons ys a (remove_all xs zs)).
pose proof (remove_all_cons xs a (remove_all ys zs)).

command: induction ds; intros; simpl in *; intuition.
induction ds; intros; simpl in *; intuition auto using remove_preserve.
induction ds; intros; simpl in *; intuition.
induction ys; intros; simpl in *; intuition.
induction l; intros; simpl in *; intuition.
pose proof remove_all_cons ys a l.
induction l; intros; simpl in *; intuition; pose proof remove_all_cons xs a l; subst; intuition; repeat find_rewrite; simpl in *; intuition.
pose proof remove_all_cons l a l'.
destruct l0; simpl in *; match goal with H: [] = _ |- _ => contradict H end; auto using nil_cons.
pose proof remove_all_cons l a l'.
match goal with H0: NoDup _, H1: _ = remove_all _ _ |- _ => specialize (IHl' _ _ _ H0 (eq_sym H1)) end.
destruct l0; simpl in *; find_rewrite; find_injection; auto.
match goal with H: _ = remove_all _ _ |- _ => rewrite <- H end.
pose proof remove_all_cons l a l'.
pose proof remove_all_cons l a (remove A_eq_dec a0 l').
destruct l0; simpl in *; find_injection; intuition.
match goal with H0: NoDup _, H1: _ = remove_all _ _ |- _ => specialize (IHl' _ _ _ H0 (eq_sym H1)) end.
pose proof remove_all_cons l a (remove A_eq_dec a0 l').
pose proof (remove_all_cons xs a (remove_all ys zs)).
repeat (break_or_hyp; break_and); repeat find_rewrite; try find_eapply_lem_hyp in_app_or; try assert (In a (xs ++ ys)) by (eapply in_or_app; eauto); tauto.
pose proof (remove_all_cons ys a (remove_all xs zs)).
pose proof (remove_all_cons xs a (remove_all ys zs)).
